metadata.title: CVE-2018-3774 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Incorrect parsing in url-parse <1.4.3 returns wrong hostname which leads tomultiple vulnerabilities such as SSRF, Open Redirect, Bypass AuthenticationProtocol.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-3774` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-url-parse - 1.0.5-2ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: node-url-parse package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.5-2ubuntu0.1~esm2').
